title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid input data including username, email, and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter valid username, email, and password
Submit the registration form
Check that registration is successful and user is redirected appropriately

title: User Registration with Missing Fields
description: Verify registration fails with appropriate error messages when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Leave required fields empty
Submit the registration form
Check that registration fails and errors are displayed for missing fields

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a registered user can log in using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
Check that login is successful and user is redirected to home page

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid email or password and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email and/or password
Click the login button
Check that login fails and error message is shown

title: OTP Verification Flow
description: Verify OTP can be sent and validated during registration and login flows.

steps.description: Initiate registration/login that requires OTP verification
Receive OTP code
Enter correct OTP code in OTP verification form
Check that OTP verification succeeds and user can proceed

title: OTP Verification with Incorrect Code
description: Verify the system rejects incorrect OTP codes and shows an error message.

steps.description: Initiate OTP verification process
Enter incorrect OTP code
Submit the OTP form
Check that verification fails with an appropriate error message

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify the forgot password process allows user to reset password securely.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page
Enter registered email address
Submit request to receive password recovery email or OTP
Complete password reset process with valid token or OTP
Check that password is reset successfully and user can log in with new password

title: Password Recovery with Unregistered Email
description: Verify error is displayed when attempting password recovery with an unregistered email.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page
Enter unregistered email address
Submit password recovery request
Check that appropriate error message is shown indicating email not found

title: Browse Products by Category
description: Verify that users can browse the products filtered by specific categories.

steps.description: Navigate to the product categories page
Select a category from the list
Check that only products belonging to the selected category are displayed

title: Product Search Functionality
description: Verify the search input returns relevant products matching the query keywords.

steps.description: Enter a product name or keyword in the search bar
Submit the search query
Check that search results contain relevant products matching the query

title: Product Search with No Results
description: Verify the system handles searches returning no products gracefully.

steps.description: Enter a random string or non-existent product name in the search bar
Submit the search query
Check that an informative 'no results found' message is displayed

title: Apply Product Filters
description: Verify that applying multiple filters such as brand, price range, and features correctly updates product listings.

steps.description: Navigate to product listing page
Select multiple filters (e.g., brand, price range)
Confirm filter application
Check that displayed products match all selected filter criteria

title: View Product Details
description: Verify that clicking on a product navigates to the product details page displaying all relevant information and reviews.

steps.description: From product listing, select a product
Check product details page displays product images, description, specifications, price, and user reviews

title: Add Product to Shopping Cart
description: Verify that a user can add a product to the shopping cart from product details or listing pages.

steps.description: Navigate to a product page or listing
Click 'Add to Cart' button
Check that the product is added to the cart and cart count updates accordingly

title: Update Product Quantity in Cart
description: Verify that users can change the quantity of a product in the shopping cart and the total price updates accordingly.

steps.description: Open shopping cart
Adjust quantity of a product
Check that product quantity updates and total price is recalculated correctly

title: Remove Product from Cart
description: Verify users can remove a product from the shopping cart and the cart updates correctly.

steps.description: Open shopping cart
Click remove/delete button for a product
Check that product is removed from the cart and cart content updates

title: Checkout with Valid Address and Payment
description: Verify that a user can successfully complete the checkout process by selecting a shipping address, applying discounts, choosing a payment method, and placing an order.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page with items in cart
Select or add a valid shipping address
Apply a valid discount or promo code
Select payment method
Confirm and place the order
Check that order is submitted successfully and confirmation page is shown

title: Checkout with Invalid Discount Code
description: Verify that applying an invalid or expired promo code during checkout results in appropriate error feedback and the code is not accepted.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page with items in cart
Enter an invalid or expired discount code
Attempt to apply the discount code
Check that the discount code is rejected and an error message is displayed

title: Manage User Profile Information
description: Verify a logged-in user can view and update their profile information successfully.

steps.description: Log in to user account
Navigate to profile management page
Edit profile fields such as name, email, and phone number
Save changes
Check that profile data updates are reflected correctly

title: Add, Edit, and Delete Shipping Addresses
description: Verify user can add new shipping addresses, edit existing ones, and delete addresses from their profile.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to address management page
Add a new address with valid details
Check new address is added and listed
Edit an existing address details
Check address updates are saved
Delete an existing address
Check address is removed from the list

title: View Order History and Details
description: Verify users can view their past orders with order details and status.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to order history page
Check that all past orders are listed with status and details
Select an individual order to view details
Verify order details including products, prices, shipping info, and status are displayed correctly

title: Add and Remove Favorite Products
description: Verify users can add products to their favorites list and remove them as needed.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to a product page
Click 'Add to Favorites' button
Check that product appears in user's favorites list
Remove product from favorites
Check that product is no longer listed in favorites

title: Submit and View Product Reviews
description: Verify that a logged-in user can submit a product review with rating and comment and can view reviews on product pages.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to a product's detail page
Submit a review with rating and text comment
Check that submitted review appears on the product page with correct data

title: Internationalization Language Toggle
description: Verify that user can switch between English and Arabic languages and the content updates accordingly.

steps.description: Locate and use the language toggle control
Switch to Arabic language
Check the entire page content updates to Arabic with proper RTL layout
Switch back to English language
Verify content changes back to English correctly

title: Access Customer Support FAQ and Policies
description: Verify that the FAQ, terms & policies, and payment/return plans pages load and display accurate content.

steps.description: Navigate to FAQ page
Check FAQ questions and answers are displayed properly
Navigate to Terms & Policies page
Verify all policies content loads and is readable
Navigate to Return and Payment Plans page
Confirm that return policies and payment plans details are shown accurately

title: Use AI Chatbot for Customer Assistance
description: Verify the AI chatbot widget loads and responds to typical customer queries correctly.

steps.description: Open chatbot interface
Type a common customer query (e.g., 'What is your return policy?')
Check that chatbot returns a relevant and accurate response

title: Load Dynamic Home Page Content
description: Verify the home page loads banners, sliders, promotional content, categories, and highlighted products correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Check that all banners and sliders load without errors
Verify categories and promotional contents are shown and are clickable
Ensure highlighted products appear in dedicated sections

title: Validate Responsive UI Components
description: Verify key UI components such as buttons, dialogs, tabs, and forms are accessible and render correctly across various screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Load common pages containing UI components
Check UI components adjust layout visually and retain functionality on desktop, tablet, and mobile views
Verify accessible roles, labels, and keyboard navigation works
